docs.abstract: Chicago Journal; Chicago welcomes home Jackie Robinson West Little League team, which won the United States Little League World Series championship in a homey neighborhood celebration on the city’s South Side; thousands of fans show up for parade and day of joy that lifts the spirits of a city and a neighborhood dulled by a sharp rise in gun violence.
